description: Two Pack. Each Squeeze Bottle is 44 Ounces. Total 88 ounces  Tomato Ketchup, 33% Red Squeeze Bottle Upside Down Shelf Stable  Country of origin: United States

latest_reviews.review: I now have ketchup to last until next year and I think Heinz is the only ketchup.  The price is one-half of all stores in my area (Sierra Foothills).  I got so tired at seeing the high, high prices that I order most laundry soap, TP, rice, mayo, etc. thru Amazon.  Save a lot!

Until I bought this, I had seen two categories of choices for Heinz ketchup: large number of bottles (whether, for example, 12 bottles of 12 oz each or 12 bottles of 52 oz each) or three-packs. I always got the three-pack of 44 oz because it's the best size for me and the price was good. Now they have a two-pack, and the price per 44 oz bottle is only very slightly higher than the price in the three-pack. I don't have to store as many bottles in my pantry, which is relatively full already.

The only hesitancy I would have is that my two bottles seemed to be taken out of a three-pack (it said "3 pack" on the neck label). As long as the sell-by date is reasonable, that is not important to me, but it is interesting.
